website_summaries.verdict: Larger than most round-shaped portable speakers, so it can deliver a nice level of audio quality.
pros: Waterproof and floats, so it's perfect to take to the pool or lake
Connects with up to 8 different Bluetooth devices at a time
Features dimensions of almost 6 x 6 in., so has a nice volume level
Has a lower than expected price point
Available in multiple color options and designs that all look great
cons: of battery life and requires about 5 hrs

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker, But Does Not Stand Upright as Implied in Photos
customer_reviews.text: Beware of photos. This speaker does not stand upright. bought this speaker because Wirecutter rated it as the top portable wireless Bluetoothspeaker, but I realized to my great surprise that there was no way to stand the speaker upright as all the photos of it picture it. The loop shown in the photos that looks as if it is a right stand is in fact a rope for hanging the speaker. The speaker's sound quality and controls are, indeed, as Wirecutter says, excellent. However, I need a speaker that sends sound outward into the room and not toward the ceiling. So I took advantage of Amazon's generous return polity and sent the speaker back.
customer_reviews.author: Da Prof

customer_reviews.title: Great but short lived.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker. Till it stopped charging about a month ago. No matter what outlet or plug you use it just says "critical power". Had already purchased a second before this started - second one still living. But - beware.
customer_reviews.author: chris blelloch

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Charging in less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped charging after a short while. Trouble shooting, determined that the charge cable was unable to charge other devices, after getting another cable and confirming it worked in other devices, I attempted to charge it again with no success.
customer_reviews.author: MattGent

customer_reviews.title: This is a easy decision...But it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a great little piece of equipment. Not sure if I would like the design, wrong, love it. It is so handy to have this shape to carry and the elastic cord that allows to be hung or attached to many different objects....But of course the sound...hard to believe this kind of sound comes out of a $70 speaker of this size. This is a no brainier purchase. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: schmidt911

customer_reviews.title: UE ROLL 2  - such a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Brought this speaker for myself to use on the beach. Tried to use it this weekend (only 3rd time it has been used) and it won't even turn on! The light blinks for a short time when trying to charge but then that goes out too. Makes no sound whatsoever. The speak looks like brand new - you can't tell it has ever been used. Just so very disappointed that it isn't working now. I also bought three more last Christmas for my grandkids. Sure hope they don't have the same experience I have had.
customer_reviews.author: beachgal

customer_reviews.title: Great for an activity speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great for an activity speaker, but battery seems to die wayyyy to fast when played loud. It can't even make the minimum advertised battery time when played near full volume (So its not working as advertised there), even when you give the speaker a break. battery does seem to last much better and as advertised when played at lower volume sort of around half volume. Amazing sound and form factor for a speaker this size and price. good features too except no 3rd button on device. I'm considering retiring to manufacture since I seem to be alone with this battery experience, but remember this is a compact speaker so it will never last as long as it's larger siblings.
customer_reviews.author: Grand n' Huge

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker experiences connectivity issues
customer_reviews.text: I'm bummed about this because I really loved the speaker so much. Recently though, my phone has been having a hard time connecting to the bluetooth. It has gone from difficult to impossible. I did a factory reset on the speaker and restarted my phone which allowed me to connect via bluetooth one time before my phone could not find the signal once again. I don't think it's an issue with my phone because I am able to connect to other bluetooth devices with no problem. I have tried both the associated app and my bluetooth settings menu to no avail. I am hoping to find a solution soon, but until then, my speaker is rendered virtually useless.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great battery & waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great! The battery life is amazing and it charges pretty fast! I listen to music all day at work and it's always at least 40% charged by the end of my shift. It really is waterproof, as long as the charger port flap is closed properly. It gets dirty at work and I can actually wash it in the sink with mild soap and warm water. The sound quality is perfect for me. I listen to hard rock, metal, and the occasional eminem albums. It's pretty loud for a tiny little thing! I take it kayaking and camping all the time with no problems. I highly recommend trying it out!
customer_reviews.author: Wink

customer_reviews.title: The speaker sounds fine. What I need to know
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is a seller or manufacturer issue, but the rubber flap that seals the AUX and USB ports seems to have been previously broken, and someone glued it back on. It completely came off the 3rd time I charged it. I tried snapping it back on with no success. The speaker sounds fine. What I need to know, and there was no manual, is it still waterproof if the ports are not covered?
customer_reviews.author: Big A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: How does so much sound come from a little package?! Amazing. I bought this b/c my wife saw someone using it in a resort pool and was impressed. This is going to be floating in my pool all season long. I haven't tested the water proof functionality yet, pool is still cold, but based on the reviews and just the general quality of this speaker, I'm not concerned. Paired this with the Boom 2 with no issues. So now I will have sound in the backyard and swimming pool. Super loud, can easily hear over pool pump and AC condenser, easily.
customer_reviews.author: prin05

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold a charge.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for our anniversary. He played it just a few times and the battery just would not hold a charge. The sound is decent and it's a cool little speaker but it just doesn't hold a charge long at all, lucky to get 1 1/2 a 2 hours of play time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Heron

customer_reviews.title: UE has great looking products/colors that have wonderful sound/range and long battery life.
customer_reviews.text: UE is simply the best. UE has great looking products/colors that have wonderful sound/range and long battery life. The most remarkable feature is that they can be linked together for surround sound. My daughter uses this with her preschool class for music during quiet time, fun time and water play. It is water proof and easy to attach to backpack and use in multiple environments.
customer_reviews.author: christine t.

customer_reviews.title: Tough little speaker stood up to my neglect
customer_reviews.text: I took a week vacation in Moab in November and came back to find I had left this little speaker outside on a wall. While I was away it rained over 4" in one day followed by snow. Thought it was toast, but after letting it dry and thaw out inside for a day, I turned it on and works and sounds as good as ever!
customer_reviews.author: dpk-VT

customer_reviews.title: portable with powerful sound.
customer_reviews.text: came very well packaged. im amazed at the sound quality for such a tiny little speaker! it's very easy to use ( + / - buttons are self explanatory and in an obvious place). haven't had any issues with functionality. at this price point, it's one of the best portable speakers you can get your hands on - especially for those who aren't in the market for an expensive alternative.
customer_reviews.author: noco s.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome design and functionality, and sound quality. I have two of these and use them paired up to provide full stereo sound. The built-in strap is fantastically useful and have used this feature a lot. For some reason the purple version of this speaker is much more expensive maybe, it's a limited color release so my second one is a grey one which is about $20 cheaper if Im not mistaken.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy sound quality for podcasts
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality isn't great. I got this so that I could listen to podcasts when I'm in the shower. Unfortunately, the sound is fuzzy, so I have to turn the volume way, way up to be able to understand what the speakers on each podcast are saying (and then I still frequently can't understand them). This would be fine for playing music at a party or in other situations where sound clarity isn't important, but it doesn't work for my specific needs. Unfortunately I missed the return window by one day, so I'm kind of stuck with it. :-(
customer_reviews.author: fishiefishies

customer_reviews.title: Near Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker, near perfect, only one thing could make it perfect, a pause/play button on the speaker. For me I was using Bluetooth and on max volume and it lasted like well over 12 hours, insane battery length. Seriously the best speaker for under $100 without a doubt, I will definitely be buying this product again someday. Only thing I'm not sure of yet is the life of the product. I will update this review if it ever stops working to add the length the speakers lifespan is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t charge (“critciallly low”)
customer_reviews.text: Works well when it’s charged. This does not charge ! After replacing the USB cord - it will won’t charge. Keeps saying critically low !! Only 1 year old !
customer_reviews.author: xrcher

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big Ultimate Ears fan and am a returning customer! I bought this for my gf's birthday and it's a durable nice sounding speaker! A lot of sound comes out of this little guy. The controls and app work fine on her iPhone and it's nice to be able to hang it on things. (I happen to think it looks like a flying saucer which is cool!) If you want something for outside or something to easily travel with etc, this is a fantastic option!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound from such a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: Ran into this speaker when building with college students who had one. Wow! A super amount of sound from a small device. Of course, it doesn’t have the bass response we might like, but both my wife and I bought one, and found they will electronically hook together for impressive stereo sound. Additional, the speaker will run for hours at reasonable volume on just one charge.
customer_reviews.author: Cigano

customer_reviews.title: Died after only a few months usage. Stop accepting a charge
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased so my daughter could listen to music while showering. After only a few months use, it has stopped working! It will not accept a charge. Considering the cost of this item, I would expect a higher quality. Very disappointed and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stark1

customer_reviews.title: Embarrassing and Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The size and sound quality is awesome. However you can’t charge your device without a block. The cord alone is useless. For this reason 3 stars. Customers like complete products. So I’m enjoying my music till the battery runs out. Then I’ll have to make a decision. Charge my phone, my new UE Roll 2, or buy another block. This purchase was a gift. Embarrassing and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Roten

customer_reviews.title: My LG4 own speaker is better: weak sound
customer_reviews.text: My LG4 own speaker is better: weak sound, and poor qualtity compared to LG4. At home i beam BT to stereo speakers on my Insignia TV, whose speakers are much stronger & clean sounding. UE Roll I use only outdoors, eg Park or beach, where I dont want my LG4 to get wet or dusty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this from amazon's warehouse and was told it was in good condition, but when it arrived it had stains ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery life indicator does not show next to the bluetooth icon in android. I think this is due to the UE android app detecting the battery? To check the battery it's a little inconvenient. You have to open the UE app. I purchased this from amazon's warehouse and was told it was in good condition, but when it arrived it had stains on it and had a foul odor. After washing with dawn soap a few times the smell was gone. It also seems like the previous owner used the rubber flap that covers the USB port to prop the speaker up. The flap is permanently bent outwards and I fear for it's waterproofness.
customer_reviews.author: B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: fun, easy and very good sound
customer_reviews.text: This is the second UE roll I buy, this was a present for my teenage nephew. Nice bright color, great for those fun days at the beach or in the park. Or indoors of course. Battery lasts several hours, quality of sound is very good, very portable, very easy to use while doing different activities from shower to gardening to cooking... always bring it with you! does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Gess

customer_reviews.title: Incredible! Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the worst conditions you could imagine. We use the back bungee to mount it in our Polaris RZR. It lasts a solid 5 hours on full volume and get splashed with water and mud all day. Never questioned if it would turn back on or charge back up! It even came with a floaty to bring in the water.. Totally worth it at this price! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Mad loud and super convenient for bicycle rides around town
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is the bomb! It's mad loud, super cute, straps on, water proof, sturdy, clear, got bass, and gives verbal output of battery charge level. I took it to Panama, bought a bike with a basket, strapped it on, and blasted Spanish music. I fit right it LOL. The only missing feature is a way to skip to the next song without going to the iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: I never leave home without it
customer_reviews.text: I loooove this speaker! My friends were so impressed with how loud this little thing gets! And the battery life is tremendous - especially if you pair it with a power bank! I gave this one to my sister because I had always planned to buy a black/red one. She totally loves it, especially the fact that it’s water resistant!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: I love this little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three of these and now they have dropped the price because the new UE speaker came out. I love this little speaker. Great sound, long battery life, very durable. I use them everyday for a variety of uses. I like pairing them together with the UE app and the sound is even better. At the price they are, you should get two.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Good. But it's small size is simply a physical
customer_reviews.text: Good. But it's small size is simply a physical, unavoidable limitation. It sounds great for a really small speaker. But in the end, it's a really small speaker and the sound is compromised. Unless it is pointing directly at your face, the sound is bad. You get what you pay for. This is size and convenience over sound. The glowing, over-the-top reviews of the sound itself are just silly.
customer_reviews.author: Fizzy Shellfish

customer_reviews.title: I love this little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker. I use it daily. It has great volume/sound, is light and portable and I've had no issues using it in the shower or anywhere. My only concern is the flap that's suppose to cover the hardware never seems to want to seal shut so I'd worry about putting it in a pool. It's loud enough to just sit on the side though. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Burns

customer_reviews.title: Small speaker with a big sound!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has very impressive sound quality for how small it is. It is portable and I carry it with me to different areas of the house as I am listening to music though my echo dot. I am very happy with my purchase of this speaker. My only negative is that the bass is lacking a little which really isn't all that shocking considering how compact this speaker is. Overall the sound quality is nothing to turn your nose up at.
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice little companion.
customer_reviews.text: I like this speaker. It's cute. The sound is a little muffled though. It gets loud but is probably best for a small room and definitely not somewhere that has a lot of background noise, as the sound gets lost. The controls are nice and simple and the bluetooth connects so easily to my android phone so thats a definite plus. At the price, it's a nice little bedroom speaker.
customer_reviews.author: mikaela

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love love it. I purchased this for myself but my daughter wanted to take it. The sound is good and clear. I use this for classes with my PP presentations. I mainly brought this because of the strap in the back. You can hang this just about anywhere. Plus it is also very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Professional Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my college age daughter for Christmas--she ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my college age daughter for Christmas--she loves this speaker. We were at the lake this summer using it and she left it on the dock--it accidentally got knocked into the water and we couldn't find it. THREE DAYS later we were swimming again and someone found it at the bottom of the lake. I thought for sure it was toast-- but we let it dry out for several days before turning it on and IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: CT74

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my little UE Roll 2, the sound is fantastic for its size. The only knock I have is how annoying it is I cannot change songs from the speaker and have to use my phone. If I'm in the shower which I primarily use this for, I don't have my phone next to me, so I have to listen to whatever Spotify is throwing out there whether I like it or not. That's the loss of 1 star, other than that it would be 5.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Just get one....I really like it!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy it. Very happy with the quality of sound and battery life. You can attach it to your bike or kayak or shower no problem! I have other speakers from Anker,Jbl, and Braven. I like all of them for different reasons. They are different sizes. I can charge this UE with solar charger out in the field and never run out of battery. Also waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Madeinhungary

customer_reviews.title: Best sounding small speaker
customer_reviews.text: My office is littered with various brands of portable bluetooth speakers that coworkers have brought in. None sound as good as my UE roll 2 and no other can hang in the same way. If it means anything, I have an expensive home audio setup, and I'm satisfied with this portable speaker when traveling The clarity and volume are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mannor

customer_reviews.title: This Should Be In Your Beach Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases. The sound is great (it isn't super bassey if that's your thing) but it's clear and can play quite loudly. It can connect with my phone from great distances. Perfect for travel as it is small and fits easily in a beach bag. Plus, if you click around the different colors some of the colors are a fantastic prices - I personally didn't care about color, I was interested in portability, sound, and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Chull

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny! Also water resistant!
customer_reviews.text: Well this review I over a year late but had to see how long they would last. Honestly one of my favorite Bluetooth speakers, great volume and clarity with minimal to no distortion at full volume. If you buy 2 you can set them up to link up and play in true stereo form. Also when two are paired together they are loud enough to be heard over the sound of a motorcycle running at 75 mph on the highway. Riñe or shine great for hiking and camping, and I take these to the beach every single time, great design, easy to use and most importantly works when wet since it is extremely water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Diego C

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to description. It's a quality, portable Bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, easy to pair, extraordinary volume without distortion, totally portable. If you want a small device that performs a simple task well, this is it. If you want it to do things like talk to you about the weather or turn on the TV look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: DLP

customer_reviews.title: Best small sized bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several bluetooth speakers. A few of them have been other UE products like the UE Boom and the UE Roll 1. From my experience with those devices, which were very positive, I made the decision to get this speaker as well. I am glad I did! This speaker is phenomenal! The sound clarity is great. The range is great. The battery life is great. It is a very solid bluetooth speaker for those on the go. I have no problem filling small to medium areas with great sound using this speaker. I have zero negative things to say about the UE Roll 2. (I was not paid, or receive compensation for my review)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fairly satisfied with this
customer_reviews.text: Fairly satisfied with this. The omni-directional sound is nice, and has good volume levels and adjustment for indoor or quiet outdoor use. Not too loud if you just want quiet background music with full tone. The big buttons are nice, but a little tough to tell at times whether it is charging when plugged in. The elastic attachment has proven handy in a few several uses.
customer_reviews.author: fish.read.shop

customer_reviews.title: Handy and reliable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Bluetooth speaker. I have had several (Bose, JBL, ect) and this is my favorite. It's built for abuse with it being waterproof and drop resistant. The bunje cord on it makes it super handy to hang or strap on to anywhere. I use it weekly on the golf course and tie it around the post of my golf cart! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jheng44

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing! I’ve used the Bose and other brands before but this is light weight, easy to travel with, battery life is long and the best part is the strap. You can hang it or clip it to chair legs(especially for the beach), umbrella arms, boat towers, table legs, and waterproof! What’s not to love. My friend had one that we used on vacation and I bought one before our trip ended and was at my door step when I arrived. Still a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations.  Stop looking and buy this one.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Honestly just wow, this speaker sounds great. Note: For Windows 10 on a Lenovo Laptop, had to go to Settings > Bluetooth > More Bluetooth Options > check "Allow Bluetooth devices to find this PC" to pair. Paired with iPad Pro w/o issue.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayaking
customer_reviews.text: Great for kayaking...had the UE2 Boom before and ended up losing it on a kayaking trip cause I didn't have it strapped in well enough, loved it too, but this model is more for a boat with the back of it having a bungee type chord to be able to strap it to about anything...
customer_reviews.author: YBliss

customer_reviews.title: but works great to strap on my bike
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as loud as my UE boom, but works great to strap on my bike, and it sounds almost as good as the boom--which is a real compliment.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Bird

customer_reviews.title: I truly love this little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this little speaker. It is light and small with a huge sound. I can be outside or upstairs away from my phone and it still works without a hitch. The only reason I gave it a 4 star is because it doesn't have a pause button. The app on my cell phone does work well with this speaker and can be pause with it if you near it.
customer_reviews.author: SBK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Traveling Trainer
customer_reviews.text: I like to add music to my classes during breaks and exercises. This is great to place anywhere in the classroom - including strapping it to things used the bungee attachment it has. Sound quality is great. Easy of use between iPhone and MacBook Pro switching is great. Battery life is also perfect for a full day of training. The weight of it - great for us weight conscious travelers who carry along a lot of things for training classes.
customer_reviews.author: Creg Schumann

customer_reviews.title: Lower Your Expectations
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived I could not wait to play some tunes through it. The device is so highly rated with glowing reviews. Was absolutely shocked with the “tinny” sound, lack of bass and mid-range. Will return to Boze Bluetooth which seems to set the bar higher than others can match.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: Fun colors, good sound volume and quality. WBA
customer_reviews.text: For walking bag. Sound is a bit directional but useable on the carrying strap of backpack. Good volume even on moderate busy streets. Wonder if it can do wired headphone output... hmmm.. that would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R.

customer_reviews.title: This is the one I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing every day! So may great things about it!! You can turn it on from your phone (app). It's loud and great quality sound. It's waterproof. Great bluetooth range. Very compact. Elastic loop is good quality and strong. This thing performs better than other bluetooth speakers I've spent twice as much on. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connectivity is TERRIBlE
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend. The issue is trying to connect to Bluetooth. It will connect sometimes but if someone else connects to them and you try to connect again - good luck because I fight them every time. It’s very frustrating to spend this money on speakers that are so difficult to connect to. Buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: CarenP

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I really love this speaker. It has great sound and the battery charge lasts forever! I bought a second one so I could pair them, but that process is far more complicated than it's worth, and rather frustrating. So I simply use them in different rooms, which is fine.
customer_reviews.author: AZgrace

customer_reviews.title: This thing doesn't die
customer_reviews.text: I'm convinced these things are immortal. I've had the same speaker for 5 years and it's still kicking. It's survived 5 years of constant outdoor use, ran over by a car, ran through an industrial dish washer a few times, used almost 24/7, and it still sounds great. It's not the best sounding speaker there is out there, but overall it's pretty decent. Essentially if you need a speaker that's invincible, or you need to survive a gunshot, get yourself a UE Roll.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Got this speaker for my boyfriend as a gift. It holds charge well and is easy to set up and use. It's also very durable. We have noticed some problems with the speaker disconnecting from devices but have found that turning it off and back on again fixes the issue. Our only complaint is that you can't advance to the next song or go back to the previous one from the speaker--you have to do that from your device. Overall a nice product though and I'll likely get one for myself one of these days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent- great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Bluetooth speaker, works great in my shower. We brought it out to the pool and I was shocked at how easy it was to hook up to my friends phone and the sound traveled far enough for everyone to enjoy. It comes with a little float to keep it above water, but it’s so nice to know it can get wet and be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth speaker at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lightweight speaker for traveling overseas, and this is exactly what i needed. It is lightweight but does not sacrifice sound quality. I have one now but will buy another soon because you can pair two at the same time. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: TerryD

customer_reviews.title: UE Roll is the best
customer_reviews.text: This UE Roll is my second. The first died out, I would often drop it and it would roll. I guess I dropped it too many times cause it stopped working but that sound is great and I needed another one henceforth the new one which is as great as my first one. I had the first one for 2 or 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Dori Martinez

customer_reviews.title: One Trick Pony
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why two stars over all is cause I'm having a hard time paring it with anything else besides my phone. I double tap the pairing mode and leave it right next, on top, or even around laptop, iPod, iPhone (cause i use to have Samsung) it won't pair and isn't discoverable.
customer_reviews.author: qni3x

customer_reviews.title: and it has never failed to draw the respect and good vibes out of friends who hear it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this item for almost a year now, and it has never failed to draw the respect and good vibes out of friends who hear it. It is sturdy, holds up next to water in the shower when it gets moist, and I've even dropped it a couple of times and the sounds hasn't changed a bit. It's got a great base sound, a soft female voice to tell you when it needs to be charged, and syncs up via bluetooth quick.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Product worked for a few weeks, and after that ...
customer_reviews.text: Product worked for a few weeks, and after that it stopped turning on even when charged. Product not submerged in water at any point.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is perfect for the golf course, or anything outdoors. I would not necessarily put it in the water, although it is waterproof, as the water gets inside the speaker and makes the sound terrible until it dries up.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Love. Love. Love.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. Needs 5 hours to charge. That's the only problem with it. But runs for 8-9 hours, great volume, and good sound. Very compact and cute. It doesn't have a mic but I don't need big brother listening to me the way "smart speakers" do. Great for playing NPR in the morning, podcasts and of course my Spotify music.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for outdoor activities
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker. Great sound quality and it can get pretty loud. I chose this over the new Wonderboom because it has a more versatile strap. It has a bungee on the back with a hook so you can hang it or strap it onto your cooler, bike, atv, or whatever. It is also waterproof so we plan to use this in our canoe and out camping. Easy to pair with every phone I have tried. It also has a long battery life. It lasts at least full 8 hour day when I use it at work. I think it could go a bit longer, but have yet to put it to the test.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Lake

customer_reviews.title: Great Design, Strong Volume
customer_reviews.text: A bit larger than I thought it would be, but quite well-designed. The claims about the range are a bit exaggerated; bluetooth claims always are. The volume is remarkable for a unit this size. I've not challenged the waterproof claims yet, but the compact design and range claims were what attracted me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Howells

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound and the color. Everytime I whip this little bullet out, my friends are all amazed at the quality of this speaker! I love to use the tag line, "It's dust, sand proof, waterproof and resistant to Bullshit" Lmao I'm excited to see just how long this product holds up. We'll done UA!
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Reid

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Have a few of them....we are professional photographers and these are mounted to our camera bags.... we all have them. The get wet, tumbled, dropped, heated.... they keep surviving. Prefer this even over the boom simply because the batter doesn't die after the speaker gets warm.
customer_reviews.author: Lee LHGFX

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality and well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is amazing and the best one I've ever bought! The sound is great, its easy to use and connect through bluetooth and its so nice not to have to worry about where I set it because its waterproof and dustproof. It straps super easy on a bike or backpack and I am looking forward to taking this to Burning Man this year with me! Also, it lasts for hours after it is charged before I need to reconnect it! LOVE THIS SPEAKER!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: great sound  and perfect for out door use
customer_reviews.text: very good sound water proof also and work well in outdoors. I use them on my golf cart as well as when working outdoors need to get two of them for balanced sound when you need sound in a large area. They can sometimes be a little tricky pair the first few time but after practice it is done quickly
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Solid speakers.  Excellent construction.
customer_reviews.text: Paired two together. Slightly tricky but once you get the hang of it, it is all good. Two sounds good. One is not enough. Don't buy the case. It comes from China and the zipper broke. Speakers are good and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Jason  Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: It can be easily carried everywhere (he'll even throw it in his bag ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my fiance, and he loves it. It can be easily carried everywhere (he'll even throw it in his bag and take it to work), even hung up in the shower, the design is sleek, and the sound quality is very nice. Also it came with a tiny flotation device for use in the pool (which we haven't used, but were really amused by). We would highly recommend this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nice speakers but hard to connect
customer_reviews.text: I have had these speakers for over six months. The sound is pretty good, the battery life is not bad, but it is not easy to connect on Bluetooth. Sometimes it works fine; and sometimes I give up. I would spend a little more next time and get a better speaker.
customer_reviews.author: L G.

customer_reviews.title: Field tested and approved
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I got my own because I loved my boyfriends. The first week I had it, the first time I take it out of my house, we used it in the ATV. I hooked the elastic band around the roll cage while we drove around. It stayed really well until my boyfriend messes with it. It then fell and bounced out of the mule and down the rock road in to the grass. The only way I found the speaker was by it still playing music. This thing is literally field tested and approved!
customer_reviews.author: Lace mckee

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker! It has been such an upgrade, coming from a little JBL Go. Don't get me wrong, the Go is a fantastic speaker for the price and size, but you just can't compare it to this. The bass is not as overpowering as on some speakers, but I enjoy that. The mids and highs, however, are exceptionaly clear. The speaker is completely waterproof, and extremely sturdy as well. Stop thinking about it, go and buy yourself a UE Roll 2 right now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my BF for his Birthday. Best gift I've ever given him! We have taken it on every road trip, camping trip and hike this summer and it's brilliant! Durable and easy to carry with you. Has a handy little rubber hook. Fun colors and waterproof. That was tested and it's true. Highly recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: suzanne e.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is solid and sounds great. Like really great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is solid and sounds great. Like really great. I have the bose color link and the sound on the UE roll 2 is far superior. Plus it's super durable and super packable. I've taken it all over the world, in the sand, sun, dirt, rain.. you name it!. Don't waste your money on any other bluetooth speaker in this class.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Barney

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, Rich Sound Like The Higher-Priced Systems
customer_reviews.text: Rich, full sound with more bass and treble than one would expect, and the sound quality gives other more expensive systems a run for their money. Volume can completely fill a good-sized room or rooms without distortion. Outdoors or in a car the bass can get lost, but the highs remain clear. The large, accessible volume controls on top are handy, responsive and the most convenient aspect of the design. Compatible and easy to control with an iPhone app, but easier still to pair it once via Bluetooth and it will always connect thereafter when powered up and remember one's previous settings. Equalizer presets are standard and can also be customized.
customer_reviews.author: Mike the PS CADC

customer_reviews.title: Super Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Still the best sounding Bluetooth speaker I've heard. Also waterproof, shock-proof, and a pretty cool-looking speaker at that. We use it just all the damn time. Like every weekend. Usually friends ask where they can get one for themselves. We actually have two and "pair" them with the app, giving us great surround sound when BBQing or hanging out on the beach. 10/10, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: It's a really great speaker. The battery lasts for a while and it connects instantly. The sound is pretty good, although I usually use it when I want to listen to music while in the shower. I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Build quality seems good - sound quality is fine but don't expect to ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally, music in the shower! Build quality seems good - sound quality is fine but don't expect to find it on Stereophile's list of recommended budget components. I found it here for 55 dollars and, at that price, I think it represents good value for money. The included floatie is great.
customer_reviews.author: PMDMN

customer_reviews.title: Mexican Mom
customer_reviews.text: My mom use to complain about how a lady at her job blasts music on her trash sounding off brand speaker at work and I said, to heck with that! So I bought her this and she has had the loudest and best sounding speaker for 3 years (and counting). Has a handy little strap on the back which has not lost elasticity in the time she used it. Battery life is better than her phone and sound quality is CRISP
customer_reviews.author: Hernan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Came in original boxing with accessories I was greatly worried as a "refurbished" item that it would be in sub par shape but I was pleasantly surprised. It has not cosmetic damage, charges and is very loud for its size or really just in general. I had 2 co workers purchase the same speaker and I finally gave in and got one. Its an excellent deal and I am very pleased with the ease of service and the honest selling conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe M.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good for the money
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good for the money. Not as good as my Bose Soundlink Color but I needed something really water resistant and this looked like the solution, except the rubber flap that cover the charging and aux inputs won't come anywhere near closing much less be waterproof. I would give the product a four other wise and could be a three if I get a hassle free replacement that works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: RBW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome speaker in a tiny package
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS THING. I originally bought it just as a shower speaker, but I’ve ended up using it pretty much regularly around my apartment. The only thing that’s a little weird, is the flap on the back that covers the power port doesn’t always want to actually go back down after it is finished charging. I’ll update if this ever actually becomes an issue. So far, it has just taken a little extra cajoling.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap speaker
customer_reviews.text: Water proof is really nice. I can take it in the shower or throw it in the pool. The float that came with it was ridiculous. threw it away immediately which felt like a huge waste.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Dunne

customer_reviews.title: Slim and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Bought the UE Boom before and saw the Roll on sale. Proceeded to buy and very satisfied with the purchase. If I am traveling with just a backpack the Roll will be the speaker of choice due to its slim nature. The sound is not as loud as the Boom of course but sufficient for smaller groups. Easy to sync as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: They love the durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother-in-law as a Christmas present, and he loves it. He and my sister are big outdoor adventurers, and this speaker has seen many backpacking, hiking, canoeing, and camping trips. They love the durability, convenience, and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker because my other 2 cycle buddies have 2 each that they pair on their bikes. I love it. The battery lasts a long time and it is loud enough to fill up a greenway with music, if you wanted to. I bring it everywhere...hotels, camping, in my hammock. It clips to everything from lamps to tree limbs. I can't say enough about this product. Did I mention it can get rained on?
customer_reviews.author: Summadread

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth connectivity and sound.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is AWESOME! I can easily attach this to any golf cart and listen to my music on the course. Plus, it's completely waterproof, so if it starts to rain you're okay.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L. Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is great. Priced right! Sound quality is great for its intended use. Water proof and portable. This this is great. I bought this for trips ans use it in my shower. Get a ton of great use out of this!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Funk

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. Never attempted the 'waterproof' part. One day though it just didn't take charge anymore- no idea why but it was my one true love. Too expensive for me to buy again but I do recommend it. Perhaps mine was just faulty.
customer_reviews.author: Ru L.

customer_reviews.title: Funky  speaker
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about it. I travel a lot, and the speaker is small enough to carry. Great sound too, and it's looks attract a lot of attention. Thanks UE Ears and Amazon. Christopher D'Lima
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dlima

customer_reviews.title: ROLL with it.
customer_reviews.text: As expected from UE, this little powerbox (power semi-sphere?) is an orgasm for the ears. I do not particularly like the shape; however, and the power charge connector port is a bit of a hassle to access. I have submerged it by accident a few times and it bounces right back to life.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne E. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: When we got the speaker, we had our doubts if you an hear music. WE WERE SO WRONG!!! It's a GREAT outdoor speaker for our pool area. The sound is fantastic! We may buy another to sync them together! Such a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: I bought two for stereo sound!
customer_reviews.text: I mountain bike with friends, and we bring two, "mate" them, and listen to our favorite music in the mountains. We attach them to our Camelbacks. Durability, battery life, all good. Sound quality crazy great!. They are light enough that we aren't bothered by carrying them. I worried that we would disturb hikers and other bikers but for the most part they love the music, and sound quality, and seem at least amused, possibly jealous, and enjoy the tunes.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander H Massey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Waterproof Speaker for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is a staple in my suitcase or my beach bag and goes with me on any trip. Perfect for a day on the river in a kayak, a day at the pool, or even on your hotel room counter when you just need music in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, won't connect
customer_reviews.text: I've wasted so much time trying to connect to this stupid speaker. It has so many great features, all of which are useless to me since I can't connect to it.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: No issues with delivery. The sound is amazing. After 2 years the speaker is working perfectly, I carry it with me to everywhere . I have never used the floating ring, but someday I will do so .
customer_reviews.author: Harold R.

product_meta.title: Ultimate Ears UE ROLL 2 Black Volcano Wireless Portable Bluetooth Speaker Waterproof
product_meta.description: Color:blueThe big, bold, beautiful sound of UE ROLL 2 gives adventure asoundtrack. Sound so loud, you'll have to shout to be heard. It’s an ultra-portable wireless Bluetooth speaker thatgoes where you go with a stretchy, attachable bungee. You caneven attach it to a kayak–it’s totally waterproof.
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,753 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
